name: Pew Pew Pew Forever
description:
WIP of a little arcade shooter I'm futsing with - Currently a 1 level endless runner, more levels and bosses likely to follow! No death at the moment! Just Pew Pew Pews! 

Runs much better downloaded - but it's ... okay... in browser

controller compatible

  • Arrows and WASD = move
  • Space bar & bottom controller button = shoot : Hold for charge shot 
  • "C" and R2/RT = Cycle through cameras (Cockpit, close chase, medium chase, far static)
  • Pew Pew Pew!!!!
